Module com.project.appointmentscheduler.main
Package com.project.appointmentscheduler.dao

Class AppointmentsDAO

java.lang.Object
com.project.appointmentscheduler.dao.AppointmentsDAO
public class AppointmentsDAO extends Object
Facilitates interactions between the Controllers and Appointments in the database

    • collisionWithStart

      public static boolean collisionWithStart(LocalDateTime start) throws SQLException
      Determines if there are any collisions between the provided start time and any appointments in the database
      Parameters:
      start - a time to compare all existing appointment times to
      Returns:
      true if the given time interferes with an existing appointment. false if there is no interference.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a SQL exception occurs

    • collisionWithStart

      public static boolean collisionWithStart(LocalDateTime start, int currentAppointmentID) throws SQLException
      Determines if there are any collisions between the provided start time and any appointments in the database, excluding the provided appointment id
      Parameters:
      start - a time to compare all existing appointment times to
      currentAppointmentID - the id number of the appointment to exclude from the collision calculation
      Returns:
      true if the given time interferes with an existing appointment. false if there is no interference.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a SQL exception occurs

    • collisionWithEnd

      public static boolean collisionWithEnd(LocalDateTime end) throws SQLException
      Determines if there are any collisions between the provided time and any appointments in the database
      Parameters:
      end - a time to compare all existing appointment times to
      Returns:
      true if the given time interferes with an existing appointment. false if there is no interference.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a SQL exception occurs

    • collisionWithEnd

      public static boolean collisionWithEnd(LocalDateTime end, int currentAppointmentID) throws SQLException
      Determines if there are any collisions between the provided end time and any appointments in the database, excluding the provided appointment id
      Parameters:
      end - a time to compare all existing appointment times to
      currentAppointmentID - the id number of the appointment to exclude from the collision calculation
      Returns:
      true if the given time interferes with an existing appointment. false if there is no interference.

      SQLException - if a SQL exception occurs

    • collisionWithInteriorAppointment

      public static boolean collisionWithInteriorAppointment(LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end) throws SQLException
      Determines if there are any collisions between the provided times and any appointments in the database
      Parameters:
      start - a start time to compare all existing appointment times to
      end - an end time to compare all existing appointment times to
      Returns:
      true if the given time interferes with an existing appointment. false if there is no interference.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a SQL exception occurs

    • collisionWithInteriorAppointment

      public static boolean collisionWithInteriorAppointment(LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, int currentAppointmentID) throws SQLException
      Determines if there are any collisions between the provided times and any appointments in the database, excluding the provided appointment id
      Parameters:
      start - a start time to compare all existing appointment times to
      end - an end time to compare all existing appointment times to
      currentAppointmentID - the id number of the appointment to exclude from the collision calculation
      Returns:
      true if the given time interferes with an existing appointment. false if there is no interference.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a SQL exception occurs

    • addAppointment

      public static int addAppointment(Appointment newAppointment)
      Inserts the provided appointment into the database. Displays an error message if the insertion is unsuccessful.
      Parameters:
      newAppointment - appointment to add into the database
      Returns:
      number of rows that were affected during the insertion attempt

    • updateAppointment

      public static int updateAppointment(int appointmentID, Appointment updatedAppointment)
      Overwrites the appointment with given id with the provided appointment in the database.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - appointment id number to overwrite in the database
      updatedAppointment - new appointment data to overwrite the existing appointment with
      Returns:
      number of rows that were affected during the update attempt

    • deleteAppointment

      public static int deleteAppointment(int appointmentID)
      Deletes the appointment with given id from the database.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - appointment id number to delete from the database
      Returns:
      number of rows that were affected during the deletion attempt
